ing: 1 head red leaf lettuce - rinsed, dried and torn
4 fresh jalapeno peppers, seeded and sliced into rings
1/2 red onion, sliced and separated into rings
des: "A nice, spicy salad - serve with a warning, and maybe a glass of milk.  A good side for Mexican or Grilled dishes."
ins: In a large salad bowl, toss lettuce with jalapeno peppers, tomatoes, Anaheim pepper, red onion, and cilantro. Serve.
